I read in the FAQ about testing abstract classes, but I do not
understand t=
he example given in the link the FAQ refers to.
When I e.g. make the test c=
lass abstract, Eclipse gives the message
"No JUnit tests found". Furthermor=
e, my classes do not follow the
Liskov Substitution Principle mentioned in =

ith

ct class?
